Is C# a programming language? C# programming language
C# is a modern, innovative, open-source, cross-platform object-oriented programming language and one of the top 5 programming languages on GitHub.
Is C# a programming language? C# programming language
C# (C Sharp) is an object-oriented programming language from Microsoft. C# is mainly used on the Windows . NET framework for desktop apps, web services, and gaming.
